summary.description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Champ-Lasso' | A Unified Approach to MEG Source Analysis under the Continuous Stimuli Paradigm | The magnetoencephalography (MEG) response to continuous auditory stimuli, such as speech, is commonly described using a linear filter, the auditory temporal response function (TRF) | This repository contains the implementation of our direct TRF estimation algorithm in python (version 3.6 and above)
summary.name: Neuro-Current Response Functions
